author: senh
title: Map Game: Where is Turkey?
text: BING NEWS: New Multiplayer Map And Specialist For Black Ops III Unsurprisingly, the former is set in the great Redwood Forest on the west coast; it was actually the last map Treyarch created for the game. That's why it should be pretty cool, as they were able to implement everything they'd learned from developing the ... 10/11/2015 - 2:26 pm | View Link Check Out Call of Duty: Black Ops 3's New Multiplayer Map and Specialist It was also the very last multiplayer map developed for the game; this worked to the map's benefit, Bunting and Vonderhaar said, as it allowed the team to put into practice everything it had learned from developing all of the game's other maps.
